hmh.android.ui.actionbar

Class ActionBarHelperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelper
      • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelperBase

  • public class ActionBarHelperBase
extends ActionBarHelper
    A class that implements the action bar pattern for pre-Honeycomb devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ActionBarHelperBase.WrappedMenuInflater
      A android.view.MenuInflater that reads action bar metadata.

      • setRefreshActionItemState

        public void setRefreshActionItemState(boolean refreshing)
        Sets the indeterminate loading state of the item with ID R.id.menu_refresh. (where the item ID was menu_refresh).
        Specified by:
        setRefreshActionItemState in class ActionBarHelper

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Action bar helper code to be run in Activity#onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu). NOTE: This code will mark on-screen menu items as invisible.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class ActionBarHelper

      • getMenuInflater

        public MenuInflater getMenuInflater(MenuInflater superMenuInflater)
        Returns a android.view.MenuInflater that can read action bar metadata on pre-Honeycomb devices.
        Overrides:
        getMenuInflater in class ActionBarHelper

      • getActionBarCompat

        private ViewGroup getActionBarCompat()
        Returns the android.view.ViewGroup for the action bar on phones (compatibility action bar). Can return null, and will return null on Honeycomb.

      • addActionItemCompatFromMenuItem

        private View addActionItemCompatFromMenuItem(MenuItem item)
        Adds an action button to the compatibility action bar, using menu information from a android.view.MenuItem. If the menu item ID is menu_refresh, the menu item's state can be changed to show a loading spinner using com.example.android.actionbarcompat.ActionBarHelperBase#setRefreshActionItemState(boolean) .
